proposal: Navigating the cross-chain seas with ease, Komodo Wallet is your non-custodial captain, now with a fiat on-ramp to make DeFi as accessible as your local ATM. With the KMD burn program heating things up, it's clear you're not just bridging blockchains; you're crafting the future of DEX. Congrats on the single, pioneering ETH network holder - a journey of a thousand miles begins with a single step, right? If expanding your toolkit is on the horizon, our B2B tools like DEX creation and DAO governance might just be the wind in your sails.
